Verifications
=============


The models that have been verified in Dymola are:

.. image:: images/DymolaList.png
      :width: 500 px
      :align: center

The models that have been verified in OpenModelica are:

.. image:: images/OpenModelicaList.png
      :width: 500 px
      :align: center

The following images are the results of linear regression verification:

Exciters
--------

**ESAC1A**

- Dymola:
    - *Fault* : Report can be found `here. <reports/Dymola/Fault/Exciters/ESAC1A_report.html>`_
    - *Load Variation*: Report can be found `here. <reports/Dymola/LoadVariation/Exciters/ESAC1A_report.html>`_
    - *ReferenceStep*: Report can be found `here. <reports/Dymola/ReferenceStep/Exciters/ESAC1A_report.html>`_
- Open Modelica:
    - *Fault*: Report can be found `here. <reports/OpenModelica/Fault/Exciters/ESAC1A_report.html>`_
    - *Load Variation*: Report can be found `here. <reports/OpenModelica/LoadVariation/Exciters/ESAC1A_report.html>`_
    - *Reference Step*: Report can be found `here. <reports/OpenModelica/ReferenceStep/Exciters/ESAC1A_report.html>`_
